name: Rosie Battista
what_you_do: Helping transformational leaders create teaching tools through product strategy and card deck development, offering both done-for-you and do-it-yourself services.
who_you_serve: Coaches, consultants, speakers, authors, and spiritual entrepreneurs looking to create products that enhance their client's experience and generate income.
signature_programs: Card Deck Creation Course, Journal Creation Course
current_projects: Courses on card deck and journal creation, offering free resources on business applications of card decks.
bio: 27 years of experience in product development, certifications in graphic design essentials by Canva, and a significant following on LinkedIn.
